data.content: In this lesson, you will attempt a variety of comprehension and grammar activities based on two stories titled Little Painters and Bluie's World.

• You will be able to understand the theme of a story based on audio cues.
  • You will be able to talk about the theme of the stories you have heard and things you like to do in your pastime.
  • You will be able to read and understand new words that you can use in sentences.
  • You will write simple sentences based on the theme of the stories.
